channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sen. Cruz to Newsmax: Democrats, Media Complicit in Joe Biden Scandal
item.description: As new details emerge about then President Joe Biden's mental decline, Sen. Cruz, R-Texas, told Newsmax every Democrat was complicit in a coverup.

item.title: Transportation Sec Sean Duffy slams blue state governor, says criminals 'continue to terrorize' city residents
item.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy sounds off on New York Gov. Kathy Hochul on X, claiming criminals are "terrorizing" New York City subway riders.

item.title: Blagojevich has new job working for ‘Bosnian Bear’ politician with ties to Putin
item.description: Former Illinois Gov. Rod Blagojevich will take on a new role representing the interests of a Serbian politician known as the “Bosnian Bear."

item.title: DOGE uncovers VA’s agreement to pay $380K per month for minor website modifications
item.description: DOGE discovered the Department of Veterans Affairs had a contract to have a company make minor modifications to the website for about $380K.
